title: DLC Docker Install Issue Mac M1
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

Trying to install DLC from Docker, pull/image download worked and then got frozen for multiple hours. See output below.

### Operating System

Mac OS Monterey  MacBook Pro M1 2020 

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Relevant log output

